item.description: Hi, Do you remember the name of the store that sold the vintage signs?
item.content:encoded: Hi, Do you remember the name of the store that sold the vintage signs?

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich

item.description: I'm not sure. I managed to find it for sale at this site but they say it is sold out. http://barscigarsandbrew.com/Monkey-Toilet-Paper-Holder-with-Plunger Maybe contacting them will help get you closer to a source that has it for sale.
item.content:encoded: I’m not sure. I managed to find it for sale at this site but they say it is sold out. http://barscigarsandbrew.com/M.....th-Plunger Maybe contacting them will help get you closer to a source that has it for sale.
